synopsis.text:
Although high school student Morifuji Shizuka appears to have it all - impressive academic performance, social popularity, and a solid circle of friends - he finds himself captivated by his classmate, Ichitaro Sakura. As final exams approach, Shizuka's thoughts are consumed by Sakura, leading him to question the nature of his feelings.

The tale unfolds in a coed boarding school, where Shizuka and Sakura share a friendship that takes an unexpected turn. Shizuka becomes enamored with Sakura's beauty during a baseball game, and his growing attraction leaves him confused. In an attempt to make light of his feelings, Shizuka jokingly suggests they share a kiss, only to have Sakura agree without hesitation.

Shizuka, now uncertain about the true nature of his feelings for Sakura, decides it's best for them to spend some time apart to gain clarity. The story weaves elements of love, misunderstanding, and angst, culminating in a heartwarming conclusion. This classic shounen ai/yaoi explores the complexities of first love and self-discovery, leaving viewers eager to witness the emotional journey of Shizuka and Sakura.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
